meanings.definition: In a competitive or confrontational manner
meanings.sent1: She played the game agonistically, always trying to win.
meanings.sent2: The two teams competed agonistically for the championship title.
meanings.sent3: The siblings argued agonistically over who got the last cookie.
meanings.sent4: The candidates debated agonistically, each trying to prove their point.
meanings.sent5: The lion roared agonistically, asserting its dominance over the pride.

meanings.definition: In a way that involves struggle or conflict
meanings.sent1: He fought agonistically to overcome his fear of heights.
meanings.sent2: The hikers navigated the rough terrain agonistically, facing obstacles along the way.
meanings.sent3: The chef battled agonistically with the stubborn jar lid before finally opening it.
meanings.sent4: The waves crashed agonistically against the shore, creating a mesmerizing sight.
meanings.sent5: The characters in the novel struggled agonistically against their inner demons.
